intro.title: Global Perspectives and World Affairs
intro.body: A closer look at the stories shaping our planet. From international developments and geopolitics to culture, climate, and social change, we explore the forces influencing life across borders. Our coverage connects global events with real-world impact, offering context, clarity, and diverse perspectives to help readers better understand an interconnected world. Through timely reporting and thoughtful storytelling, we bring the world closer to you every day worldwide.

article.title: Apple Vision Pro 2 Outsells Meta Quest 3 in Holiday Season Rush
article.excerpt: Apple's second-generation mixed reality headset has dominated the holiday shopping season, outselling Meta's Quest 3 by a 3-to-1 margin. Industry analysts attribute the success to improved comfort, reduced price point, and exclusive content partnerships with major streaming platforms...
